00020 /*****************************************************************************
00021 
00022   sc_nbexterns.h -- External functions for both sc_signed and sc_unsigned
00023                     classes. These functions work on two parameters u and
00024                     v, and copy the result to the first parameter u. This
00025                     is also the reason that they are suffixed with _on_help.
00026  
00027                     The vec_* functions are called through either these
00028                     functions or those in sc_nbfriends.cpp. The functions in
00029                     sc_nbfriends.cpp perform their work on two inputs u and v,
00030                     and return the result object.
00031  
00032   Original Author: Ali Dasdan, Synopsys, Inc.
00033  
00034  *****************************************************************************/
00035 
00036 /*****************************************************************************
00037 
00038   MODIFICATION LOG - modifiers, enter your name, affiliation, date and
00039   changes you are making here.
00040 
00041       Name, Affiliation, Date:
00042   Description of Modification:
00043 
00044  *****************************************************************************/
00045
